info.name: A Galaxy is Born - Interactive

renderpass.code:
#define M iMouse
#define R iResolution
#define T iTime
#define pi 3.14


void mainImage(out vec4 fragColor,in vec2 fragCoord)

{vec2
m = ( iMouse.xy != vec2(0) ) ? M.xy/R.y*.5 : 5.5/vec2(100,100),
u=5.*m.xy*(gl_FragCoord.rg-R.rg/2.)/R.y;

float
d=pow(2./length(u),2.2),
t=.05*(T+5.*m.x),
i=floor(d-atan(u.g,u.r)/pi*2.),
a=atan(u.g,u.r)+pi/2.*i,
h=.002*a+5.2*t,
s=fract(a*1.2*t)<.1?3.:0.,
v=fract(a*t)>.1?3.:5.;


fragColor=vec4(sin(pi*2.*(h-vec3(1.,.888,.666))),1.);}
renderpass.name: Image
